channel.title: CVE Feed for Axelerant -- Testimonials Widget
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Axelerant -- Testimonials Widget

item.title: CVE-2024-37553|2024-07-06T16:03:32.989Z -- axelerant -- testimonials%20widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Axelerant Testimonials Widget allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Testimonials Widget: from n/a through 4.0.4.
